WorkItem.Description: Ive tried reinstalling and redling, it keeps crashing when i try and load my character from Armory. My best guess is cus i have shadows edge. It doesnt have that axe in the weapon database so it fails to load properly. I would really apprieciatte some help on this matter.
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr Crashing upon loading from Armory

Comments.Message: There is no information here to reproduce the bug.  Please read http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=BugReportingFormatGuide for information on how to post a bug report that will be helpful to all involved.

Are you a ret pali if so you should be tracking the following issue http://rawr.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=16780

Note: If Rawr does not have an item in it's database that does not make it crash, it just downloads the infromation.
